```{r setup, message = FALSE,warning = FALSE,include = FALSE}
# load relevant libraries
library("tidyverse")
library("sf")
library("leaflet")
library("leaflet.extras")
library("leaflet.extras2")
```

This is a test map to check GPS support in leaflet. Enable location sharing in your mobile devices settings for the utilized browser. 

```{r projectmap, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,  fig.width=8}
map <- leaflet() %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron, group="CartoDB") %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery, group="Satellite") %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldShadedRelief, group="Topography") %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$NASAGIBS.ViirsEarthAtNight2012, group="Nightlights") %>%
  # fullscreen control
  addFullscreenControl() %>%
  addLayersControl(
  baseGroups = c("CartoDB","Satellite","Topography","Nightlights"))

map <- addControlGPS(map, options = gpsOptions(position = "bottomleft", activate = TRUE, 
                                               autoCenter = TRUE, maxZoom = 10, 
                                               setView = TRUE))
activateGPS(map)
```
